items.summary: Update the one-command Android APK build script (`frontend/scripts/build-android-apk.sh`) to support building a release APK (in addition to debug) and to copy the resulting APK into `frontend/android-apk-output/` with a deterministic, clearly named filename.

Update `frontend/ANDROID_APK.md` to document how to produce the final (release) APK using the repositoryâ€™s one-command build script, including the exact command(s) and the deterministic output path(s) under `frontend/android-apk-output/`.
